mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, username, icon, content, img_count, img_url, link, create_time, modify_time FROM ld_relation_trending WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{start}, 50
mapper.delete: DELETE IGNORE FROM ld_relation_trending WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND id = #{trendingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO ld_relation_trending (user_id, username, icon, img_count, content, img_url, link, modify_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{icon}, #{imgCount}, #{content}, #{imgUrl}, #{link}, now())
